```{r}
data  <- read_csv("Data.csv")
head(data)
```

```{r}
names(data)
data[4:12]
```
```{r}
spp.rich <- specnumber(data[4:12], MARGIN=1) 
shannon <- diversity(data[4:12])

data <- cbind(data, spp.rich, shannon)

ggplot(data, aes(x=City, y=shannon)) + 
  geom_boxplot()
```
```{r}
ggplot(data, aes(x=City, y=spp.rich)) + 
  geom_boxplot()
```

```{r}
nmds <- metaMDS(data[4:12], k=2, trymax = 30) 


```

```{r}
plot(nmds, display = "sites")
with(data, ordiellipse(nmds, City, col=4, lwd=2, draw = "polygon", kind = c("sd"))) 
with(data, ordispider(nmds, City, label=TRUE))
```

```{r}
ef <- envfit(nmds, data[13:19], na.rm = TRUE, permu = 999) 
ef
```

